# Variable DEFAULT_LLM_MODEL_NAME`Const`

DEFAULT_LLM_MODEL_NAME: "meta-llama/Llama-3.1-70b-Instruct" = 'meta-llama/Llama-3.1-70b-Instruct'

Default LLM model name for text generation. Standard model used for LLM-based text generation tasks.
